extension.description.short.message: PreMiD adds Discord Rich Presence integration, media controls and much more to your beloved services.

extension.description.full.message: It allows to use your media keys to control the playback of those services. When you start watching/listening something on one of our supported services, the browser extension sends the meta data of the video/song to our desktop client and PreMiD processes it. PreMiD sends the information with the correct form to Discord and automatically sets your status afterwards.
